welcome_message_body: "Welcome to South Milwaukee, a charming city known for its rich history, friendly community, and beautiful lakefront. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at General Mitchell International Airport houses the ticketing counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is the newest addition to the airport, featuring modern amenities and a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D is the international terminal at General Mitchell International Airport, serving flights to and from Canada and Mexico.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. No password required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence J Timmerman Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Lawrence J Timmerman Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options and a gift shop.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport provides a VIP experience for private jet travelers, with luxurious lounges and personalized services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
